WorkItem.ClosedComment:
Hi,

I'm closing the work item, since Larry Brader has already provided an explanation for this behavior in the ModuleInfoGroup class.

Thanks,

Guido Leandro Maliandi
http://blogs.southworks.net/gmaliandi

Comments.Message:
While the ModuleInfoGroup does inherit from IList, it actually useds Collection underneath, which returns a Void not a integer.

IList is used to support issues with Silverlight.  But the Collection is still used underneath.
